asResource

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource asResource(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode res)
Convert a resource specification to a resource. A resource may be specified by a shortname in a query string or a literal giving a shortname in a spec file as well as simply being a resource already.

Specified by:
asResource in interface ShortnameService

asResource

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource asResource(String res)
Description copied from interface: ShortnameService
Answer a resource with uri = expand(s). If there's no such expansion but s "looks like" a uri, return a resource with uri = s. Otherwise throw an API exception.

Specified by:
asResource in interface ShortnameService

constructURItoShortnameMap

public Map<String,String> constructURItoShortnameMap(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m,
                                                     com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.PrefixMapping pm)
Description copied from interface: ShortnameService
Answer a freshly-constructed map from URIs to shortnames, based on the shortnames declared to this ShortnameService. All URIs in the Model have shortnames allocated if they don't have them already. The prefixes in the PrefixMapping may be used when constructing these new shortnames.

Specified by:
constructURItoShortnameMap in interface ShortnameService
